WorkflowInfo.Name: Delete all empty folders
WorkflowInfo.Description: Delete all empty folders in a specific folder
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process retrieves a list of all folders in a given directory, and deletes every folder with size 0 KB. This process will help you maintain your server cleaner and easier to navigate in.
WorkflowInfo.XML: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:FolderList;Assembly=FolderList, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:ResultSetFilter;Assembly=ResultSetFilter, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:FolderSize;Assembly=FolderSize, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:DeleteFolder;Assembly=DeleteFolder, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:FolderList Password="" TimeInSeconds="0" HostName="LocalHost" x:Name="folderList1" DisplayName="List Folder" IsValid="True" HostId="1" TimeSelection="00:00:00" Path="c:\" Filter="0" TypeName="FolderList" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" isRecursive="0" Condition="0" Timeout="00:05:00" UserName="" Description="List the contents of the specified folder." FilterSelection="False" MapDrive="False" /><ns1:ResultSetFilter IsValid="True" x:Name="resultSetFilter1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="ResultSet Filter" VariableName="%folderList1%" Description="Filter a Result Set" TypeName="ResultSetFilter" FilterStatement="Type = 'Directory'" /><ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%resultSetFilter1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="resultSetFilter1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"><ns3:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /><ns4:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="FolderPath" ColumnNumber="3" ResultSet="%resultSetFilter1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="resultSetFilter1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns5:FolderSize IsValid="True" x:Name="folderSize1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Get Folder Size" Path="%FolderPath%" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Returns a folder size" HostId="1" TypeName="FolderSize" UserName="" /><IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"><ns6:ReturnValue Value="0" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Equals" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals("&&&","0")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns7:DeleteFolder IsValid="True" x:Name="deleteFolder1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Delete Folder" Path="%FolderPath%" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Delete the selected folder." HostId="1" TypeName="DeleteFolder" UserName="" /></IfElseBranchActivity><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"><ns6:ReturnValue Value="0" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Not Equals" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Not Equals("&&&","0")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /></IfElseBranchActivity></IfElseActivity></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
